short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify that the online version of ySyPyA match the public code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Once this extension is installed you can use it to validate the integrity of ySyPyA client, for that:
- Go to the ySyPyA Home Page
- Click on this extension
- Reload the Home Page

Et voila...
